content.html: First time I've seen a pop-up advert in @gmail on the web. I get that it is for a good cause, but feels totally misplaced. And my contributions would be nothing compared to Google donating some pocket change.
content.value:
First time I've seen a pop-up advert in @gmail on the web.
I get that it is for a good cause, but feels totally misplaced.
And my contributions would be nothing compared to Google donating some pocket change.

photo.alt: Pop up asking people to donate to Ukraine relief efforts.
